name: King Tut's Tomb
overview: "Explore the corridors of gloomy tombs. Use a musket, shields, flash bombs and land mines to defend against 7 types of deadly beasts. Up to four players, five levels, arcade and dungeon challenges in 48 different tombs. " King Tut's Tomb was clearly based on the arcade game Tutankham, and the initial map provided is nearly identical, with similar gameplay restrictions - the player can only shoot right and left, not up or down. Holding down the OPTION key when booting loads the Create-a-Maze program which allows you to create new mazes.
